Package controller

Class SimController

java.lang.Object
controller.SimController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISettingsControllerForM
public class SimController extends Object implements ISettingsControllerForM
SimController is a class that controls the simulation screen.

  • Method Details

    • circleOfElements

      public int[][] circleOfElements(int area, int size, int amount)
      Creates a circle of elements.
      Parameters:
      area - The area of the circle.
      size - The size of the elements.
      amount - The amount of elements.
      Returns:
      The coordinates for the elements.

    • setSimulationParameters

      public void setSimulationParameters(int simTime, double arrivalIntervalValue, int ticketBoothCount, int rideCount, int restaurantCap, long simDelay, double wristbandChance, ArrayList<int[]> rideProperties, SettingsController settingsController)
      Sets all parameters for the simulation.
      Parameters:
      simTime - The total time the simulation should run for.
      arrivalIntervalValue - The arrival interval for customers (in simulation time).
      ticketBoothCount - The number of ticket booths.
      rideCount - The number of rides.
      restaurantCap - The capacity of the restaurant.
      simDelay - The delay between each event (in ms).
      wristbandChance - The chance for a wristband on each new customer.
      rideProperties - The properties for the rides (mean and variance).
      settingsController - The settings controller for the simulation.

    • startSim

      public void startSim()
      Starts the simulation with current parameters.

    • stopSim

      public void stopSim()
      Stops the simulation.

    • toggleSimRunning

      public void toggleSimRunning()
      Toggles the simulation running state.

    • pauseSim

      public void pauseSim()
      Pauses the simulation. Uses the suspend method which is marked for removal.

    • resumeSim

      public void resumeSim()
      Resumes the simulation. Uses the resume method which is marked for removal.

    • changePauseButtonText

      public void changePauseButtonText(String text)
      Changes the text on the pause button.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to change to.

    • calcCenterX

      public int calcCenterX(int width, int offset)
      Calculates the center x coordinate for a point.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the area the point is in.
      offset - The offset for the point (its size).
      Returns:
      The center x coordinate.

      Returns:
      The center y coordinate on the canvas.

    • drawServicePoint

      public void drawServicePoint(int x, int y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, int number)
      Draws a service point on the canvas.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate for the service point.
      y - The y coordinate for the service point.
      color - The color for the service point.
      number - The number of customers at the service point.

    • drawServicePointNumber

      public void drawServicePointNumber(int x, int y, int number, int defaultValue)
      Draws the number of customers at a service point.
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate for the service point.
      y - The y coordinate for the service point.
      number - The number of customers at the service point.
      defaultValue - The default value for the service point (essentially its capacity in reverse, like -20).

    • calculatePath

      public double[] calculatePath(double[] origin, int[] destination, int steps)
      Calculates the path for a customer to move from one service point to another.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin cords of the customer.
      destination - The destination cords of the customer.
      steps - How many steps the customer needs to take in total, affects dx and dy.
      Returns:
      The next coordinate point for the customer to move to.

    • getAnimationSteps

      public int getAnimationSteps()
      Gets the amount of steps for the animation.
      Returns:
      The amount of steps for the animation.

    • visualizeResults

      public void visualizeResults(HashMap<String,Double> staticResults, TreeMap<String,Double> dynamicResults)
      Description copied from interface: ISettingsControllerForM
      Visualizes the results of the simulation.
      Specified by:
      visualizeResults in interface ISettingsControllerForM
      Parameters:
      staticResults - The static results of the simulation, that is the results that all simulations have.
      dynamicResults - The dynamic results of the simulation, that is the results for all the service points in the simulation.
